titleInfo.title: Rachel and Aimee Peyser at the Mangini Dancing School

physicalDescription.extent: 2 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On front of photograph: ''Denver, 1902.'' On back of photograph: ''Sept. 1902 1 and 2, 1. Rachael Peyser, l to r, 2. Aimee Peyser.'' On back of photograph: "Sept 1902, right to left, 1. Rachael Peyser, 2. Aimee Peyser, #525.'' On envelope: ''Strauss Family (Aimee Peyser) #525.''

mods.abstract: Two male and one female dancing instructors stand to the left and six little girls in white dresses stand on the right. Rachel and Aimee Peyser are on the far rightâ€”Aimee is at the end of the line on the right. Rachel Peyser is on the left. There is a sign over the door of the building, which reads, "Prof T. Chas Mangini Teacher of Dancing".
